Did you switch to 'file_system' sharing strategy? The default on Linux is 'file_descriptor', but your stack trace includes:

  File "/usr/local/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/storage.py", line 114, in _new_shared
    return cls._new_using_filename(size)
body:
Did you switch to 'file_system' sharing strategy? The default on Linux is 'file_descriptor', but your stack trace includes:

```
  File "/usr/local/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/storage.py", line 114, in _new_shared
    return cls._new_using_filename(size)
```
